title: As Darkness Ends
description: A powerful darkness spawning deadly hunters. An order from a messenger of God. A journey that will destroy all of humanity.As Darkness Ends is a non-linear series. As such, you can read the books in any order!When a devastating earthquake strikes Manhattan, Travis Hunter finds himself among the other survivors trying to make sense of a city in ruins. In the aftermath, word spreads among the displaced: New York City was only a small part of a global disaster. For the first time in human history an earthquake shook the entire world.While trying to get back home, Travis is confronted by a being from another realm and tasked with a divine mission: help bring on the apocalypse or be killed. Faced with this directive from a messenger of God, Travis must assume a role dating back to the beginning of time and is forced to begin a journey that will destroy all of humanity.
author: Aaron Crocco
